member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.PolicyInjection.PolicyInjector
member.summary: A non-static facade class that provides the main entry point into the Policy Injection Application Block. Methods on this class create intercepted objects, or wrap existing instances with interceptors.

remarks.para: This facade can be initialized with either an or an . In the latter case, a new container will be created and it will be disposed when the policy injector is disposed.
